rounds.msg: Count after eliminating Eric Swalwell and transferring votes. Since this is the first elimination round, all candidates without any votes are eliminated.

action.desc: Since this is the first elimination round, all candidates without any votes are eliminated.

rounds.msg: Count after eliminating Beto O’Rourke and transferring votes. Candidates Tim Ryan and Beto O’Rourke were tied when choosing candidates to eliminate. Candidate Beto O’Rourke was chosen by breaking the tie randomly.

rounds.msg: Count after eliminating Bill de Blasio and transferring votes. Candidates Bill de Blasio and Kirsten Gillibrand were tied when choosing candidates to eliminate. Candidate Bill de Blasio was chosen by breaking the tie at round 4.
